website_summaries.verdict: The best budget HyperX headset for gamers wanting the premium basics without unnecessary extras.
pros: High quality leather pads separate the ears from the speakers for a more realistic sound production
Good balance between the lows, mids, and highs
cons: Headset lacks physical controls over the volume and microphone

customer_reviews.title: Mostly use this to play rainbow six siege
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few headsets over the years, PlayStation gold, turtle Beach stealth 520, gaming earphones all on PS4. This is my first dedicated PC headset I have purchased and the sound is alright and clear, but I have noticed that I have trouble telling where enemies are coming from with these. For overall audio these are great, but for situational awareness these have been giving me trouble. I'm sure experiences may vary but that has been mine so far. I'm stuck in plat right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 years on, still working
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for two years with my PS4. Better than any of the no-name brands I tried. They also sound better than the playstation gold headset I use on my other system. I don't chat a lot online so I don't know about the mic. I finally noticed the rubber on the plug that attaches to the controller is starting to crack. It still works, but I have wrapped in electrical tape. Just last month I used the crack as a reason to purchase the Hyperx cloud alpha and they feel even better and have an inline volume control. I didn't need them, but I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Gshul512

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: First thing i noticed was how lightweight it was, i use it for gaming on my Xbox One X and so far they're great, bass is very nice and punchy, you can hear every little thing in Red Dead 2 that's for sure. Gunshots sound realistic and visceral, they really put a lot of thought into details like the little dots or notches on the inside of the metal sliders when adjusting the fit on them, so u always have a number that u know is a comfortable fit like for me its 3 notches and the fact that the cable is braided. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Risi Liyanapatabendy

customer_reviews.title: Do not last long
customer_reviews.text: These worked great at first when we got them in November but now the microphone part has stopped working and because we are a few days outside of the 6 month window from when we ordered them there is no option on here to get in contact with the seller or a way to try and get a replacement microphone. For the amount of money we spend on these things it's dissapointing when they don't even last a full year. I'm definitely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Frey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The HyperX Cloud series is without a doubt the best headset i have found. They are perfect in every way. This is my second pair. My first bite the dust after my son got a hold of them. Those were the Cloud ][s. This go around i just bought the core set. Awesome thing is the mic, fabric ear cuffs and control dongle (external sound card) all work with the Core. Its now actually the Cloud][s by using the dongle. From now on i am a solid HyperX Cloud fan. Thinking about a spare pair just in case the child gets a hold of these lol
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Overall Rating 9/10
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this headset. They're extremely comfortable and adjustable. After a few minutes I can't feel them on my head anymore. The detachable mic is great since I don't always use it and don't need it there all the time. Sound quality is superb and it really enhances my overall gaming experience. They work well for listening to music on also. My one and only complaint is that I wish they could get louder. But the noise cancellation is surprisingly good. Definitely recommend for gaming and general entertainment purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hall

customer_reviews.title: Repurchasing because I like the quality of this headset and how sturdy it ...
customer_reviews.text: Repurchasing because I like the quality of this headset and how sturdy it is. The first one lasted me two years and it still works, albeit with some problems. I came to this headset from cheap Turtle-beach headphones that broke after no more than six months. This headset, while not perfect, is a much better value for me and I love it Problems-- After about 1 and a half years, the microphone stopped working. After 2 years, the right side would randomly cut out unless I twisted the cord just right These problems are small to me, especially for a relatively cheap set of headphones. They are durable as frig, they feel nice, and they're simple.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through many many "gaming" headsets. They all break. This one hadn't broken yet, and I store it in a desk drawer without being especially careful. It sounds so good I use it when I have to make phone calls on my cell. Works great with Discord and other voice apps. No one complains about my terrible sound quality any more. Great for drowning out random room noise too. Works great for watching movies on a laptop and for ignoring whiny cats.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Zen

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for iPhone gaming.
customer_reviews.text: I play pubg on iPhone X. In the past I always used the standard lighting earbuds - which are actually quite nice. After a lot of research - this looked like the best set for the money (that seem to be well constructed to last). I did need to buy a lighting to 3.5mm converter for iPhone X - which was like 5 bucks. These headphones have a solid feel, fit extremely comfortable (I'm 6 1 230lbs, with a rather big head) and the sound is fantastic! I have not been able to find an adapter to lighting charge with 3.5mm splitter that works :/
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin & Tara Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best So Far
customer_reviews.text: The Cloud Core is probably the best performing headset in this price class, at least that I have tested and used. Mic quality is excellent, even when used by a screaming teenaged boy in the throes of fight game frenzy. The headphones are comfortable and noise isolating, and the cable (and extension) are long and cat-proof. That last one is important. In the 18 months she's been on the planet, The Sylph has eaten several headsets and three MacBook Air adapters. Happy with purchase and would buy again. Hopefully, won't have to.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Head phone of poor quality
customer_reviews.text: At first glance these seem really nice, they cancel some noise and the sound is sort of clear. The only problem is one speaker went out on the right side. There is wire running from the left to the right under all the coverings. That wire is right next to a screw and rubs and shorts out the right side of the head set. I presently have a peace of duck tape holding the wire in s certain position to make both speaker work. Also I had to duck tape the cord in such a away that the microphone will work. In other words these are junk and I wish I had never bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty comfortable to wear which is uncommon for me with ...
customer_reviews.text: For one thing, thank god for a headset that has no volume control/mute button on the cord. Those things are just designed to break your headset. They are pretty comfortable to wear which is uncommon for me with headsets that cover your ears. Usually others I've tried are too tight or crush my ear overtime. They've lasted 5 months so far without issues, which is also uncommon for me. Have these headsets uncovered the secrets behind durable cords? We'll see as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: ARE YOU KIDDING ME?
customer_reviews.text: How are these the best headphones I've ever heard?? I've had $1000 AKGs, studio monitors, Klipsche headphones... but these little gaming headphones are the best sound quality AND the best SPL (bass) I've ever heard in a headphone. Comfortable, can wear them for hours, and that sound! Oh, that sound.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy T

customer_reviews.title: Little disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good. I've got worse and better headphones, but I think this is a good price point for a gaming headset. Microphone sound quality isn't great, however. I've learned now that I prefer the type of boom mic that flips up. This microphone always seems in the way, so I tend to take the microphone off when I'm not using it. Nice long, braided cord. Earcups are good quality and soft, and wearing it for many hours it's quite comfortable. Headband isn't too tight, seems just about right.
customer_reviews.author: ryan dowell

customer_reviews.title: Great headset, but it stretched out and doesn’t work as well as before because of that
customer_reviews.text: I used this headset for about 6 months. It’s a really good headset sound quality wise, used it to play games and listen to music. Decent mic, too. After 6 months of use, it stretched out or something and it doesn’t fit anymore. The noise cancelation doesn’t work as well and the audio quality isn’t that good anymore because it doesn’t fit properly on my head. And I don’t have a huge head or anything. I really enjoyed using this headset, so I hope I can get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Abernathy

customer_reviews.title: Not XBox One compatible (without adapter)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product because it said it was compatible with XBox One... plugged it in and wasn’t receiving audio in or out... read through manual and it says XBox One “needs adapter (sold separately)”... why is it advertised as Xbox One compatible if you need to purchase an adapter separately
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These fit pretty good. I have a big head and so most headsets sit on my head a bit uncomfortably, but these aren't too uncomfortable for me in particular. They are amazingly durable and I love the braided cord. The aluminum makes the headset feel like a solid piece, and the detachable mic makes the headset even more interchangeable between devices; removing the annoyance of a mic in your face when it is not needed. The leather ear pads are comfortable and the sound quality is great. Mic sounds smooth and clear. Overall a good buy, but if you can afford the extra $20 or so on a better pair, go for it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific value
customer_reviews.text: This would top a chart for best value headset... Love it. I'd probably say 70% noise cancelling. Can still hear conversations/tv jumble in the background. Extremely comfortable fit. I like how the microphone unplugs from the headset. This is also important to me, because of the last 3 headsets I have had it has been microphone related. If this one goes out, I will simply buy the microphone attachment and be back in business rather than having to buy a new headset. Great work, will be watching HyperX products much more closely now!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Radakovich

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Everything
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headset! I've been using it for 3 months now so I think that's long enough to give a solid review. So, it's not the best headset out there, obviously, but you are getting your moneys worth. This is by far the best headset for 70 dollars. Very comfortable to wear when you adjust the headset to the correct height. It has the best audio I've ever heard from a headset in the mid-teir price range. People say the mic quality is great when they hear me talk. Overall, if you are looking to get a headset in the $50-100 range, get this one, its worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Hobson

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Definitely one of the best headsets I have bought! Wish it had more bass to it though as it seems a bit treblely but you can always crank it up with software as I did. I recommend paying the extra $30 for the Cloud 2 to get the 7.1 USB surround card if you don't have a proper sound card to fully utilize it, wish I did as onboard sound that comes on motherboards are generally inferior. You can always buy the USB sound card later on if you end up going with the Cloud Core as well.
customer_reviews.author: Somber

customer_reviews.title: Clear sounds, mic issue.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product in replacement for my other Hyperx headset and the sound on these is amazing. ISSUE: Only issue i have with these is that the mic is to low and i have to fix my setting on my pc which i never had to do before with my last headset and even after fixing the settings its still kind of low but enough that others can hear me. OVERALL: Cant give this a full 5 star because of the mic but everything else is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Robles

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my gaming son
customer_reviews.text: Great price, and the reviews made me take a chance on these for my son, who needed a new gaming headset. His only complaint is that the microphone has no mute button - a big deal when your mom bothers you? :| He's very happy with the comfort and the sound. A great buy and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Appliance Queen

customer_reviews.title: Best Headset for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Headset. Sounds great, feels comfortable on my head, doesn't have static. An outstanding headset especially for the price. I've had 2 for about 3 years. I broke my first one by pulling my chair out with it caught on the arm rest and then immediately bought a new one.
customer_reviews.author: William Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones for the price point.
customer_reviews.text: Im picky when it comes to headphones. I like really expensive brands for music. That being said, I got these on sale at Amazon and they do a great job for gaming. My favorite pair of cans for music cost 12x more and they sound quite a bit better. For the price I love these. Bass is decent and sound clarity is good. They are very comfortable and cup the ear well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built, reasonably priced, good sound
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with these. I use them for Xbox One video games and have the Microsoft connector from a prior headset. I bought them after my Microsoft brand stereo headset cracked and then the microphone stopped working. These have good sound. I can hear my friends talking and hear someone trying to creep up on me in Georgopol. As long as these last a few years, I’m getting them again next time.
customer_reviews.author: Old and in the way

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headsets
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much the best $60 headset you can get, comfortable, great sound and looks good. Works out the box with my xbox and pc! I previously had Audio Technicas Ath Ad 700s and after 6s years of weardown I decided to buy these and don’t regret it specially for the price point!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is why we cant have nice things
customer_reviews.text: The only reason it is a 3-star for durability is because we bought this second pair for my son for Christmas. He had been using my wife’s, and loved them. They stand up to a lot of stuff, but... We were less than 30 seconds into Christmas vacation (literally, about to pull out of the driveway, for a 20hr drive), and the jack on the old (less than a year) on snapped right off. Fortunately, the new ones were one of only 3-4 presents that we hadnt blocked in with luggage.... Got them to have a pair of headsets, and now back down to one.....and the cord doesn’t unplug from that one..... the rest of the headset is super durable!
customer_reviews.author: Beca ramos-beckert

customer_reviews.title: The microphone is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I got this headset to replace a much cheaper corsair headset, and the microphone quality is terrible. It sounds like the microphone is in a different room, and there's a lot of static. The sound quality is also way worse, and the bass range is much smaller than most other headsets I've tried. I'm going to be returning this unless I can find a fix for the microphone quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Great headset - feels premium
customer_reviews.text: These feel amazing on the ears. They block out a great deal of noise just by being on. The detachable headset is a nice feature. It would be nice to have a switch, but I really appreciate that I can pull it off it I want. The build quality feels very solid. Sound quality also seems very good. I don't have a ton to compare to, but I really like these.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: I own 3 of the HYPERX headsets. 2 cores and a cloud 2. Very Comfortable. Like a cloud on you ears. Great sound and base for gaming. My father uses one for the tv cause he doesn't want the tv volume so loud and these help him hear better. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought so many gaming headsets over the years from $50 to $120. The hardest part was finding one that was actually comfortable. Although this headset doesn't simulate surround sound, the sound quality is awesome. The quality of the headset is fantastic as is the sound quality. I'm very happy with the headset and will purchase another HyperX headset in the future when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at sub $25 head sets and while the earphones could out out good sound, the microphone was poor quality. Plus the feel was also poor quality of the sub $25 headsets. This headset is worth the extra money. It has a comfortable feel (I do wish it was slightly lighter but not a deal breaker at all). The microphone quality is fantastic! The cable is braided and looks durable. Comes with an extender cable that also splits the audio from the mic for computer setup. Loving it every bit.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Love this headset
customer_reviews.text: Love this headset. Microphone is clear. Ear pads are soft and cushy. Headset is do lightweight it doesn't hurt after hours of wearing it. Love that the mic is removable so I can use it for regular headphones when I want to. Cord is incredibly long which is useful as well.
customer_reviews.author: pprbckwrtr

customer_reviews.title: One of the best gaming headsets i have use so far
customer_reviews.text: One of the best gaming headsets i have use so far, it sounds clear, mic sounds clear, plug and play with my ps4 and pc. Used them for hours and never had any discomfort, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: GrumpyFelo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: These are very high quality headphones. I love that you can detach the mic. I do wish they had even just a slither of a volume box on the wire so I didnt have to keep adjusting in my PS4 settings. Overall, very good. The bass is super loud and it noise cancels ALOT. My landlord was knocking at my front door and my room is very close and I couldn't hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Gamer

customer_reviews.title: For $60? Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my girlfriend. Amazing. Comfortable with adequate mic quality. Attractive design and packaging was beautiful. Payed $60 for these and it was well worth it. I would recommend these to my friends any time.
customer_reviews.author: KAYEFFOMEGA

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and high quality, definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few months ago to play video games on my xbox and PC. The black headset with the red logo and stitching is perfect, I absolutely love it. As far as I can tell, the audio quality is great, sounds are crisp and powerful in the low and high ends. The chord comes with an adaptor and is a high quality rope like material. The mic is detachable and the ear pads are big and comfortable. I previously owned a Razer Kraken Pro V2 before this and I definitely like this headset a bit more!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: They sound really good. You get a clear crisp sound that allows you to hear every explosion and every footstep. I was very impressed with the product from the moment I put them on. The quality is very solid and the materials feel very high quality. Very pleased with my purchase. Highly recommend this to others. Oh I also changed the earpads to red camo wicked cushions to give it more of a gamer feel to it. It really wasn't necessary but they make it look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Gecko

customer_reviews.title: comfortable headphones but inferior sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This review is being posted a month after purchase. headphones overall are comfortable for long gaming sessions which is the greatest perk. The greatest downfall comes in the actual audio quality. The headphones struggle with sharp sounds although handles the in between fairly well. I also feel the sound of the headphones lack depth compared to similar monitor headphones at same price point. good heaphones for basic sounds and long term comfort. if looking for superior audio quality I would rec coughing up 125 bucks for some Sens
customer_reviews.author: Heather Avioli

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones however the one thing I didn't notice was ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphones however the one thing I didn't notice was there was no volume control. The 4 stars are due to the fact when the cord is plugged into the extension section I tend to get static. It is not horrible but enough of a issue I want a different set of headphones. All in all they are not that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: The Greatest
customer_reviews.text: I have had over 8 different headsets, some cheap and some overpriced, and let me tell you all those 'cool' expensive ones sound like muffled garbage im talkin butt cheeks clapping behind concrete walls muffled, but THESE don't. The sound is very clear and it has lasted me a long time, the only thing they're lacking in is mic quality like if you're listening to music others might be able to hear through your mic. Other than that no complaints. Worth the price, get em.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Krave

customer_reviews.title: No volume control? Are you guys serious??
customer_reviews.text: I honestly dont know what happened to Kingston this time....This "gaming" headset is worth almost 60.00 and has NO VOLUME CONTROL. Whereas the Cloud Stinger Core are worth only 40.00 and offer a deeper sound with much better bass and has its built in volume control. You guys should know by now thats a must for a gaming headset To give a little credit I would say the braided cable is a good selling point but then again, way too short. The build quality is awesome and it doesn't feels cheap. I will request a return option as the sound is not good, the lack of volume control COMPLETELY kills the whole deal and the cable is way to short.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: adapter prong broke in the controller.
customer_reviews.text: Adapter prong broke in the controller. Had a hard time getting broken piece out. Nothing seems to be made well anymore:( The Companies warranty is only 6 months, so of course this broke at 7 months.
customer_reviews.author: Suez

customer_reviews.title: Decent headset, nice mic just no controls on the mic, headset, or cord is a no go...
customer_reviews.text: As a headset they are pretty decent comfortable and nice sound. But the mic not having any sound controls on the headset or the cord is annoying and a pain in a noisy house. Though I will say having a noisy home with children it was amazing how it would block a lot of those sounds out, I would say avoid if you want it to pick up your coughs, voice, burps, dogs barking and children screaming....
customer_reviews.author: Burt

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable! great sound! I am very pleased with this product!!! I actually got turned on to this company when my wife bought one of their other pairs of headphones of a different style. so I checked them out and also bought from this brand! So happy i went with them and this headphone set!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cartier

customer_reviews.title: happy investment
customer_reviews.text: I play pubG and Fortnite. My previous headphones were the absolute worst so maybe thats why these are a 4 but i absolutely love them. I didnt realize they wernt USB and for some reason my 3.5mm audio and mic jacks arnt working so i bout an adapter. Any who once i started playing with these bad boys, my game play changed for the better. Very clear and vivid headset and they feel great. Sturdy and very comfortable. I do have concerns on how long the padding and leather will last but for now they work great. Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Estevan

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfy and lightweight. I have them on for hours and can't complain. The only dislike I have is the fact that it doesn't have a volume change on the headset. For example, if you have a PS4, you need to change it from the sound settings.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't call these spectacular by any means, but they are pretty nice for the cost. I use these mainly for gaming and discord. The sound quality is definitely above average and they work fine for my needs. The biggest con for me is the cord; it's CONSTANTLY tangled and and curling up even after i untangle it. Also occasionally only the right side will work and the left side is not outputting any audio, usually only occurs for 5 or so minutes a day but not preferable by any means. Overall, suits my budget and I'm not too picky so I give these a 4/5.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Best headset ever! It doesn't hurt my ears or give me a headache. Mic is detachable and it was a long cord ♥ When I use it in a game party i can hear everything clearly. These are so good, I can't hear if anyone is calling my name while I use these xD It's perfect !
customer_reviews.author: Squid

customer_reviews.title: Good for about three months and then cuts in and out.
customer_reviews.text: Updated: it turns out it wasn’t the headset. It was the remote!! It worked well for three months and now it cuts in and out. Super frustrating. Junk
customer_reviews.author: DWeb

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dope!
customer_reviews.text: For weeks I was looking for decent and inexpensive headset for the ps4 & long behold I found these. Been using this for two months now & no complaints. Sound is crisp & headphones are noise cancelling which is great! I highly recommend these if you want to enjoy your online experience.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Barry

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality Headphone/Lots of Static Noises
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for a friend for Christmas. She’s a gamer and needed new ones because her old ones were worn out. She loved them at first. It was very comfortable and she really enjoyed them at first. Unfortunately, within a week she started hearing some really loud static noises, which I’m assuming came from some issue in the headphone jack/wires. It got pretty irritating and caused a lot of pain in her ear. Somehow these really affected her ear drums and she’s had to visit the doctor twice already. I am very disappointed in how these headphones turned out to be. Won’t be buying headphones from this brand ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect on my Xbox s with the (Microsoft) headset adapter ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect on my Xbox s with the (Microsoft) headset adapter that is kinda hard to find. Without one of the adapters you cant adjust anything but i would prefer the adapter over an in-wire control that over time goes bad. The quality of the headset is absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.author: MarkC1982

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift and the receipient loves this headset! He uses it for his PS4. He also uses it to watch Netflix late at night and sounds like a beaut!
customer_reviews.author: Socal_A

customer_reviews.title: Love these damn things
customer_reviews.text: Love these damn things, I can wear them for hours and not feel uncomfortable or hot or sweaty in any way. Most comfortable set of headphones I've ever had. Sound is good, and the mic is good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for  three months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this headset in March of 2018. After three months the jack connecting to the controller is loose and the headset no longer works. Unfortunately the cord cannot be disconnected from the headset and replaced.
customer_reviews.author: RTP

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The hyper X brand has been making some good gaming headsets for awhile now owning this pair personally I would put them against the astro a40tr headsets which is definitely saying something since that headsets pushing nearly $190. They show and sound better than they cost so yes a definite buy.
customer_reviews.author: MOTOxICON

customer_reviews.title: My best set of earphones
customer_reviews.text: No volume control but these are my best set of earphones have used them for years now nothing bad to say work awesome on my ps4
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing i would recommend them to anyone i use them for music and playing video games and they are great but this is only day 1 if they turn out different i will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Hoeplebo

customer_reviews.title: Its awesome
customer_reviews.text: This headset blew me away. Not only is unboxing some next level stuff, but the quality and design is simple but excellent and that's why I love it. It is not some rgb mumbo jumbo that looks good but sounds horrible. Its mic detach feature is cool and its quality is insane. It pickups even minut noises. The sound quality is soooooo good.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Kerrigan

customer_reviews.title: HyperX Cloud Core Gaming Headset
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality. I was able to use the Dolby surround unit out of a Plantronics GameCom and it was like a charm. They are extremely confortable and you can wear them all day. Microphone quality is amazing if you play team games.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony F.

customer_reviews.title: Replacing the ear pads is a MUST
customer_reviews.text: I got these to replace my original HyperX Cloud 1 headset that finally broke on me. They look identical to the original pair, but when I put these on they sounded horrible. I tried swapping the "leatherette" pads for the leather pads from the old headphones, and it sounded just like the original. Not to mention they were more comfortable. Changing the ear pads makes a night and day difference, and the ones included are awful. Avoid buying unless you can swap the pads out. EDIT: Now broken after one drop, just a month after purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Lake

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a set of HyperX headset for a couple of years and I love them! Great sound quality, great mic. I haven't had any issues with them and are still working great. I bought these for my husband after he went through 3 headsets in the same amount of time. So far he loves them too.
customer_reviews.author: SweetRyoko

customer_reviews.title: Good price / quality
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are well made and good quality. The only issue is, the head phone cushions are kind of small, so my ears start hurting after a while
customer_reviews.author: Juan Zaidman

customer_reviews.title: Amp card crashes my computer
customer_reviews.text: TL:DR When the amp card is plugged in during operation, it works just fine! When booting up the computer, it can't make it past bios and windows goes into self-recovery mode. After windows "fixes" whatever the issue was, my graphics card driver was uninstalled. After reinstalling, I unplugged the soundcard and the computer boots up just fine. Everything is up-to-date and it works just fine without the soundcard. Good pair of headphones nonetheless so I just use the soundcard when console gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and spacious!
customer_reviews.text: The less I think about my ears, the better. I generally have issues with a lot of gaming headsets because their ear cushions rest on the ears or they're too shallow and my ears bump against the inside of them, which really gets irritating after a few hours of wearing them. (Lookin' at you, SteelSeries Arctis...) However, the HyperX Cloud headset was the best I've experienced since the now-discontinued Razer BlackShark. I'm not a great judge for sound quality, so I can't help you there, but they're comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: The jack is a POS.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 3 months. I was very careful with it, but the jack just snapped off in my controller one day and I could get the piece out. it was the tip of the jack too. Not like I bumped it and snapped the whole thing off. It just fell off in my controller when I unplugged it one night.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: These are great headsets. Block out outside noise and effective microphone quality. Would recommend these to anyone. I've heard things playing Xbox that I never heard on TB Speakers/old headset. 5 Star Quality Product
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Buy this headset
customer_reviews.text: I love the HyperX Cloud series. Very solid sound quality with amazing comfort - I wear these 6, 8 hours a day and don't feel a thing. I've been using variations of the Cloud for 4 years now, and I'll never not recommend these to a friend. Outstanding value for your money. The only gripe I've had over the years is that my friends will occasionally note that my mic tends to be pretty quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Zou

customer_reviews.title: Use every day. Never let's me down
customer_reviews.text: Second set I've owned. Use them every day for work on laptop. Sound is great and very comfortable. One of the best ever for the price. Love them. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like how comfortable these headphones are. But if you wear glasses like me, it will get a bit painful after a couple of hours. If you can sit close enough to the screen without wearing glasses, they are perfect. The sound is decent, not anything groundbreaking though. The noise cancelling isn't that great; I can hear everything outside of it. I love how the cables are sturdy and strong; the extension is very long which helps.
customer_reviews.author: Holy Tran

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are a good deal for the quality. I think the sound is nice and I'm enjoying listening to music on these. Some time ago, I owned a Razer Kraken Pro that would leave the areas behind my ears sore after so many hours; no such problem with these. However, my main problem with headphones is usually the eventual shorts in the wires, so I'm pleased that this wiring is wrapped in a nice sturdy threading that won't twist or kink, which I imagine will extend the life of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: which is pretty rare finding one that justifies this price
customer_reviews.text: I got this headset a few weeks ago because I was looking for an affordable, quality gaming headset, which is pretty rare finding one that justifies this price. I chose the cloud core because it's very similar to other headsets in the series, but I didn't want to pay extra for accessories. The mic is great, there aren't any echos present and the sound quality and the build is excellent for the price. Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Leo I.

customer_reviews.title: Expected quality
customer_reviews.text: After using it for a while now i can say it's definitely a good choice. I wished the microphone was slightly longer than the current length however mic quality is great for gaming. You will not be recording your voice for music production anyway.
customer_reviews.author: A. Elkhouli

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones for price
customer_reviews.text: The build is high quality, the sound is alot better than most headphones at this price, and the microphone works great, the mic works great and taking it out can be helpful, my only complaint is there is no built in mute button on the headphones or on the wire but I'm just being picky, overall it's great for xbox
customer_reviews.author: HMiller

customer_reviews.title: Best for Casual Gameplay
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great for casual gameplay. The comfort is there, the sound quality is great, they're sturdy but not heavy, overall great headphones. I was only disappointed at the fact that you can't control in-game/chat-room volume separately, or mute yourself without having to take out the mic out entirely. But like I said before, these are the ones I use for casual gameplay with friends and I enjoy them. Also just my personal preference but I love the black and red style.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great headset for the price. Superb. Affordable and very comfortable. Mic could be better but certainly gets the job done. No complaints at all. I pair this with the Astro Mixamp TR to get the maximum effect as well as ability to control game and chat audio independently.
customer_reviews.author: A.Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! But with a catch....
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly well. Almost too well. When I wear them, I can't hear myself speak. But that's because I black out and wake up in Narnia every time I use them. Is this normal?
customer_reviews.author: Pinky Torres

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headset
customer_reviews.text: I use these for gaming, video and have used with smartphone. Very comfortable over hours of gaming. I would buy a second time and recommend. Removable microphone is a very nice option.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Stievenart

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose I needed them to serve perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I got these with the main purpose of having a headset I could use with my PS4 and PC. So far, these have done everything I have needed them to do extremely well. Incredibly comfortable, mic quality is pretty good, noise cancellation is surprisingly good, sound quality is probably the best I've heard at this price range. Of course, the sound and mic quality would be much better with a good set of headphones and a good mic, but that usually comes at a much higher price-tag. For the price, these things can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid build, sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for gaming on my computer. To me it sounds great and other people have said the mic sounds good also. I have had it for about two months now and the quality of construction seems great. I think this product will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Josh S.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Rugged, Reliable
customer_reviews.text: This mic is super sensitive and does everything you need it to. I would never buy another headset again. Ive had these for 3 years and I have thrown them, they have been beat up, thrown in suitcases, and still function just as the day I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Mic no longer works after less than 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for almost 1 month exactly, and my microphone no longer works. After setting it up friends complained that they could barely hear me unless i put it very close to my mouth, which was annoying but not the end of the world, but now the mic is no longer working at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I work at a call center and this gaming headset is amazing. It is comfortable and sets around my ears not on them so my head/ears don't hurt at the end of the night. Well worth the money for me as I can also take them home for when I'm off to play my XBox or PS games.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: They're pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It's a good headset for the money and the headset feels really really nice. The sound is pretty good. Not $100+ good but it's definitely good enough for the price. I like them a lot
customer_reviews.author: nick sokol

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 2 weeks, then stopped completely
customer_reviews.text: These were good while they lasted. However, that was for only 2 weeks. Must be very poor quality or construction. Next time I will pay-up and get a higher quality headset. These were a total waste!
customer_reviews.author: Neo

customer_reviews.title: Great audio and comfortable fit, but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in 2018. Unfortunately, the microphone has been giving back a lot of static recently so I replaced the microphone. Unfortunately, that didn't fix the issue and the mic goes to static if you move the cord whatsoever. TL;DR - Comfortable, great audio, but microphone may die after a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great pair for a great budget
customer_reviews.text: Bought this headset on the beginning of May. It's now the middle of September and I couldn't be more satisfied with my purchase. Nothing has gone wrong with it so far. Very durable also, it has fallen off my desk more times than I can count lol. The only smallest con I could find is that the wire can tangle or wind up pretty easily. But let's be honest I'm just nit picking at that point. Overall 10/10 from me.
customer_reviews.author: i loved

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son, the gamer, needed headphones that were oval so they wouldn't press on his outer ears. They worked. He says they are far more comfy than the previous 3 pair. Sound quality is good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mom complete

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and they work really well havnt tried to use the microphone yet but sound quality and surround sound is great
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bixby

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming or working for home
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a gamer and I use these to work from home. My clients never complain about my sound. My husband loves them too. They are comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: WifeMamaBear3.0

customer_reviews.title: Intense buzzing sound from mic
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed these overall. Right after I bought them I noticed an intense buzzing sound that was particularly detrimental to those I was playing with. I began to plan to make a return and then it suddenly stopped. Now, after approximately 9 months, the buzz is back. Frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for sons
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift for all 3 of my sons. They enjoy these headphones very much. Gives them a great quality gaming experience.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Cosgrove

customer_reviews.title: I was on the fence about forking up the money on these headphones but I am happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: The first few days I had the unit I got up to answer the door a couple times thinking I heard a knock when it was just background to what I was listening to. I was on the fence about forking up the money on these headphones but I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Buy $60 for this is a steal
customer_reviews.text: I really like this headphone it is definetly worth the money. I have only had this product for a week but it's been good and the headphones sound great my omelet complaint which isn't a big deal is I had to buy a chat adapter for $25 for my Xbox but thats usually expected, anyway I got free same day shipping and that is awesome I had waiting for a week or so for a product
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Do not work!
customer_reviews.text: My son didn’t get to use this gift immediately because he’s not allowed to use his xbox all the time and he had sports - when he did we discovered they weren’t functioning - very disappointing! past silly 30 day return window!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne S. Wilhelmsen

customer_reviews.title: The Core works great and I would buy these again
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after breaking the Cloud 1 because of loose wires. The Core works great and I would buy these again. Just keep in mind the mic quality is not the best (having issues with it being too quiet but can be resolved by increasing microphone boost) but is passable.
customer_reviews.author: BaoBaoBaoBab

customer_reviews.title: Yep
customer_reviews.text: They must work great, I have to throw stuff at my stepson to get his attention when he's wearing them..
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Baze

customer_reviews.title: For people with tiny ears
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty average sized ears. Wearing these headphones for any amount of time hurts. Wearing them for longer than an hour or so will leave my ears sore for the rest of the day. These headphones are not comfortable. Other than that, they work okay.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Gruppo

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic gaming headset. Was recommended by a gamestop employee. Totally worth the money. You can use it on either a console or PC. We now have 3 in our house, one for myself, my husband and our son. Sound quality is great and mic quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Danyelle Holloway

product_meta.title: HyperX (KHX-HSCC-BK) Cloud Core Gaming Headset - Durable Aluminum Frame - 53MM Drivers - Detachable Microphone - Works with PC/PS4 and Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
product_meta.description: Hyperx Cloud Core has leatherette memory foam ear pads and a super-soft padded leatherette headband for maximum comfort, even when you're stuck in an endless battle.
feature_bullets: Enhanced comfort so you can game for hours
Superior Audio with the same specs as HyperX cloud
Compatible with PCs, PS4 console, Xbox one, Wii U and mobile devices
Detachable Microphone; TeamSpeak and Discord certified so you’ll be heard loud and clear
Hi Fi capable with 53 millimeter drivers for supreme quality and immersive in game audio

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,632 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
